Ext.namespace("Ext.coo.channel.sum");Ext.coo.channel.sum.g_url="coo/channel_sum.do";Ext.coo.channel.sum.extWindow=Ext.extend(Ext.Window,{params:{},constructor:function(){this.form=new Ext.FormPanel({cls:"x-panel-mc",autoHeight:true,border:false,bodyStyle:"padding:5px;",labelWidth:65,items:[{xtype:"fjs-store-radio",name:"Suffix",fieldLabel:"文件类型",dictId:"system.export.excel",groupcfg:{name:"Suffix"}}]});Ext.coo.channel.sum.extWindow.superclass.constructor.call(this,{iconCls:"btn-excel",title:"Excel 格式",width:420,autoHeight:true,border:false,closable:true,closeAction:"hide",modal:true,plain:true,resizable:false,items:[this.form],buttonAlign:"center",buttons:[{iconCls:"btn-accept1",text:"提交",handler:this.window_submit,scope:this},{iconCls:"btn-stop1",text:"取消",handler:this.window_close,scope:this}]})},window_close:function(){this.hide()},window_submit:function(){this.params.action="export";this.form.getForm().submit(Ext.fjs.loadAction({url:Ext.coo.channel.sum.g_url,params:this.params,success:this.apply_success,scope:this}))},apply_success:function(form,opts){Ext.fjs.download("/down.php?filename="+opts.result.message);this.window_close()}});Ext.coo.channel.sum.MainPanel=Ext.extend(Ext.grid.PropertyGrid,{constructor:function(){this.refreshBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-refresh",text:"刷新",tooltip:"刷新",disabled:false,handler:this.refresh,scope:this});this.exportBtn=new Ext.Button({iconCls:"btn-excel",text:"导出",tooltip:"导出",disabled:false,handler:this.export_onclick,scope:this});var cm=new Ext.grid.ColumnModel([new Ext.grid.RowNumber()<s:header id="coo.channel.sum"/>]);this.store=new Ext.fjs.PageStore({url:Ext.coo.channel.sum.g_url,baseParams:{action:"list"},fields:[<s:fields id="coo.channel.sum"/>]});this.store.load({params:{}});Ext.coo.channel.sum.MainPanel.superclass.constructor.call(this,{region:"center",store:this.store,stripeRows:true,autoScroll:true,boldHeader:true,closable:true,containerScroll:true,columnLines:true,cm:cm,loadMask:true,tbar:[this.refreshBtn,{xtype:"tbspacer",width:5},{xtype:"tbspacer",width:5},this.exportBtn]})},refresh:function(){this.getBottomToolbar().doRefresh()},apply_success:function(res,opts){var rs=Ext.decode(res.responseText);if(rs.success){Ext.fjs.showInfo(rs.message);this.refresh()}else{Ext.fjs.showError(rs.message)}},export_onclick:function(btn){Ext.fjs.showInfo("导出功能暂未开放!")},beforeDestroy:function(){if(this.addWin)Ext.destroy(this.addWin);if(this.modWin)Ext.destroy(this.modWin);if(this.extWin)Ext.destroy(this.extWin);Ext.coo.channel.sum.MainPanel.superclass.beforeDestroy.call(this)}});
